select data_id, sys_flag, data_order, del_flag, create_date, create_user, create_user_disp, modify_date, modify_user, modify_user_disp, form_code, data_index, status, audit_status, company_code, update_user, update_date, project_id, project_name, zjk_id, zjk_name, train_theme, train_date, train_type, train_user, train_desc, do_desc, xm_steps, xm_id, xm_name, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5 from zjk_train where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and sys_flag like '%${sysFlag}%'
and data_order like '%${dataOrder}%'
and del_flag like '%${delFlag}%'
and create_date like '%${createDate}%'
and create_user like '%${createUser}%'
and create_user_disp like '%${createUserDisp}%'
and modify_date like '%${modifyDate}%'
and modify_user like '%${modifyUser}%'
and modify_user_disp like '%${modifyUserDisp}%'
and form_code like '%${formCode}%'
and data_index like '%${dataIndex}%'
and status like '%${status}%'
and audit_status like '%${auditStatus}%'
and company_code like '%${companyCode}%'
and update_user like '%${updateUser}%'
and update_date like '%${updateDate}%'
and project_id like '%${projectId}%'
and project_name like '%${projectName}%'
and zjk_id like '%${zjkId}%'
and zjk_name like '%${zjkName}%'
and train_theme like '%${trainTheme}%'
and train_date like '%${trainDate}%'
and train_type like '%${trainType}%'
and train_user like '%${trainUser}%'
and train_desc like '%${trainDesc}%'
and do_desc like '%${doDesc}%'
and xm_steps like '%${xmSteps}%'
and xm_id like '%${xmId}%'
and xm_name like '%${xmName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
